name: Spaceship Warrior
description:
SUMMARY:

Spaceship Warrior was developed during the course of  the discipline "Projeto de Jogos: Plataformas Alternativas" by the Digital Games course from Unisinos in 2020/1.

You take control of a spaceship and will need to protect the generators from being destroyed by the enemy ships.

GAMEPLAY EXPLAINED:

GAMEPLAY:

You can play it either using an Arduino or regular keyboard and mouse.

Thanks for playing.
